tp:treatment-sec.p: Within D . ( Deltohyboma ) only few species which possess the anterior margin of clypeus expanded posteriorly into a triangular shape have more than four elytral apical tubercles. Frequently, in species bearing over four apical tubercles, the anterior margin of the clypeus is not expanded into a triangular shape. D . gilli is one of those few exceptions.
